text: The University of Bamenda (UBa), also known as (Anglo-Saxon University), is a public university in Bamenda, northwestern Cameroon. The institution was established in 2011. It is the second English language university in Cameroon. It started as a Higher Technical Teachers Training College. == References == Category:2011 establishments in Africa Category:21st-century establishments in Cameroon Category:Colleges and universities in Africa Category:Organizations based in Cameroon
title: University of Bamenda
